actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to require a strategic plan to improve capabilities of Department of Defense training ranges and installations.
short_title: Department of Defense Training Ranges Strategic Planning Improvement Act of 2018

summary.text:
Department of Defense Training Ranges Strategic Planning Improvement Act of 2018

This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) to develop and implement a comprehensive strategic plan to identify and address deficits in the capabilities of DOD training ranges to support current and anticipated readiness requirements to execute the National Defense Strategy.

titles.title: A bill to require a strategic plan to improve capabilities of Department of Defense training ranges and installations.
